title: Exception ticking world entities导致的服务器崩溃【大触都来看看吧】
author: LiNXinYA
txt_content:
服务器版本：1.12.2 服务端核心 spongeforge  1.12.2-2705-7.1.0-BETA-3206服务器使用pixelmon重铸模组 版本为6.3.1
错误报告内容： 
DESCRIPTION: EXCEPTION TICKING WORLD ENTITIES

JAVA.LANG.NULLPOINTEREXCEPTION: EXCEPTION TICKING WORLD ENTITIES
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.ENTITY.PLAYER.ENTITYPLAYER.FUNC_96124_CP(ENTITYPLAYER.JAVA:2284)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.ENTITY.PLAYER.ENTITYPLAYER.FUNC_145748_C_(ENTITYPLAYER.JAVA:2291)
        AT COM.PIXELMONMOD.PIXELMON.STORAGE.PLAYERSTORAGE.<INIT>(PLAYERSTORAGE.JAVA:150)
        AT COM.PIXELMONMOD.PIXELMON.STORAGE.POKEBALLMANAGER.LOADPLAYER(POKEBALLMANAGER.JAVA:216)
        AT COM.PIXELMONMOD.PIXELMON.STORAGE.POKEBALLMANAGER.GETPLAYERSTORAGE(POKEBALLMANAGER.JAVA:53)
        AT COM.PIXELMONMOD.PIXELMON.LISTENER.WORLDEVENTLISTENER.FUNC_72709_B(WORLDEVENTLISTENER.JAVA:40)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.WORLD.WORLD.FUNC_72847_B(WORLD.JAVA:1226)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.WORLD.WORLDSERVER.FUNC_72847_B(WORLDSERVER.JAVA:1128)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.WORLD.WORLD.FUNC_72939_S(WORLD.JAVA:6560)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.WORLD.WORLDSERVER.FUNC_72939_S(WORLDSERVER.JAVA:2222)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.SERVER.MINECRAFTSERVER.FUNC_71190_Q(MINECRAFTSERVER.JAVA:767)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.SERVER.DEDICATED.DEDICATEDSERVER.FUNC_71190_Q(DEDICATEDSERVER.JAVA:396)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.SERVER.MINECRAFTSERVER.FUNC_71217_P(MINECRAFTSERVER.JAVA:668)
        AT NET.MINECRAFT.SERVER.MINECRAFTSERVER.RUN(MINECRAFTSERVER.JAVA:526)
        AT JAVA.LANG.THREAD.RUN(UNKNOWN SOURCE错误代码如下
-- Head --
Thread: Server thread
Stacktrace:
        at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer.func_96124_cp(EntityPlayer.java:2284)
        at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer.func_145748_c_(EntityPlayer.java:2291)
        at com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.storage.PlayerStorage.<init>(PlayerStorage.java:150)
        at com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.storage.PokeballManager.loadPlayer(PokeballManager.java:216)
        at com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.storage.PokeballManager.getPlayerStorage(PokeballManager.java:53)
        at com.pixelmonmod.pixelmon.listener.WorldEventListener.func_72709_b(WorldEventListener.java:40)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72847_b(World.java:1226)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72847_b(WorldServer.java:1128)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:6560)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:2222)如果觉得金粒不够可以再加，其他号还有很多金粒!
只需要一点有用的帮助即可！！！

replies.author: 水杉
replies.txt_content:
实体错误 
在服务端目录下找到forge.cfg文件
B:removeErroringEntities
B:removeErroringTileEntities
默认为false 改为true 保存重启服务器

replies.author: LiNXinYA
replies.txt_content:
水杉 发表于 2018-7-3 11:29
实体错误 
在服务端目录下找到forge.cfg文件
B:removeErroringEntities
无效，依旧会出错
